thread.title: Several regions of Huelva, on red notice due to torrential rains
thread.title_full: Several regions of Huelva, on red notice due to torrential rains

author: admin_l6ma5gus
title: Several regions of Huelva, on red notice due to torrential rains
text:
The Andévalo, Condado and Litoral regions of the province of Huelva have been on red notice due to the rain accumulated during the night and waiting that, in principle from 9:00 a.m., they may be torrential and turn orange; During the early hours of the morning, 112 handled around 80 incidents.
The president of the Junta de Andalucía, Juan Manuel Moreno Bonilla, has highlighted this through his social networks, with a message in which he has also asked “exercise caution . Please, let’s not leave home whenever possible and avoid travel or any unnecessary risk. Prudence”.
For its part, the Huelva City Council has also made a call for caution and protection while the mayor of Punta Umbría, José Carlos Hernández Cansino, has also warned of the situation and has reported the closure of the road that gives access to the town, while requesting not to remain in areas that have on occasion been closed. awash”.
Like Punta Umbría, Lepe, Cartaya, Ayamonte and Isla Cristina They keep their Municipal Emergency Plans active. The mayor, Adolfo Verano Domínguez, and the councilors of Citizen Security and General Services have been together with Civil Protection and the Local Police monitoring the progress of the storm during the early hours of the morning.
For his part, Cartaya’s Manuel Barroso has reported on the road closure that connect the center of El Rompido with Cartaya and Nuevo Portil and has asked for responsibility, after a night in which municipal services had to transport numerous children who were on the street to their homes after being surprised by the rains; Likewise, flooding has been recorded in the La Galera area.
From 112 they have informed EFE that since 2:00 a.m. they have managed, mainly in municipalities on the coast and the metropolitan area, nearly 80 incidents due to flooding and flooding of basements and garages; They highlight the entry of water into the basement of a hotel in Gibraleón and in a nursing home in Aljaraque; No human damage has been reported.
To these incidents we must add the multiple ones that municipal services have had to attend to throughout a rainy morning in which, for hours, strong lightning and thunder have been recorded.
#regions #Huelva #red #notice #due #torrential #rains
